title: PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working
body: So the game was running fine all day. While loading my last game right after champ select I received a Bug Splat and I could not load the game. When I tried logging back in, it made me run a patch. After patching and now every time I try to load the game I receive the error message "PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working." I completely uninstalled and reinstalled the game and that did not help at all. Please help!!

replies.body:
Patcher Kernel errors usually occur if League isn't operating with the right system permissions it requires. I recommend launching the application as admin by right-clicking on the shortcut and selecting *run as administrator*.

Let me know if this fixed it for you. ^.^
